criteria.priceReach: Based on authoritative price data sources, reaching or exceeding the target before the deadline counts as success

criteria.default: Based on objective verifiable sources, meeting the condition before the deadline counts as success

comments.loadPreviewFailed: Failed to load discussion preview, please try again later
comments.migratedToForum: Discussions have been moved to the dedicated chat room in the forum
comments.migrationReason: To keep all opinions, strategies and reviews in one place, inline discussions are no longer provided here. You can continue the conversation in the Foresight forum chat room for this event.
comments.noDiscussion: No discussions yet. Be the first to start a topic in the forum!
comments.forumDescription: The Foresight forum is the core community for prediction market participants to share insights and strategies. You can create topics to discuss real-world events or join deep analysis of existing predictions.
comments.chatHint: In the forum you can view full message history, topic lists and related prediction markets.
comments.orCreateNew: to discover events to discuss, or

outcomes.realTimeUpdate: Updated in real-time based on market prices

detail.priceHint: Price represents the implied probability of the event. You can buy or sell positions at any time and quickly adjust when your view changes.
detail.proposalOriginHint: This prediction market originates from community discussions in the Proposals Square. You can go back to the original proposal to continue exchanging ideas and iteration suggestions.
detail.defaultDescription: On-chain prediction market event. Trade your views on a decentralized blockchain-based prediction market platform.

searchPage.metaTitle: Foresight Global Search - Discover Prediction Markets & Proposals
searchPage.metaDescription: Quickly discover trending prediction markets, community proposals and discussions through Foresight global search. Connect events, governance and strategy research with keywords.
searchPage.jsonLdDescription: Foresight global search results page, aggregating on-chain prediction markets, proposal square and discussion content to help you quickly find related events and topics.
searchPage.heading: Global Search
searchPage.body: You can use the search box in the top right corner (‚åòK) to quickly search prediction markets, proposals and discussion content. This page is for external links and SEO descriptions. When you trigger search from the navigation bar, the global search panel will open.
searchPage.queryHint: The current URL contains query parameter q={query}. You can enter in the top search box again for real-time results.

trending.platformDescription: Foresight is a decentralized prediction market platform built on blockchain. You can create and trade predictions on real-world events, express your views using cryptocurrency, and earn potential returns.
